p: Rosmarinic acid (RA) was first isolated from Rosmarinus officinalis L. (Lamiaceae) by Scarpati and Oriente in 1958. RA is an ester of caffeic acid and ( R)-(+)-3-(3,4-dihydroxyphenyl) lactic acid ( Figure 1), is prevalent in a wide range of plants, and a bioactive component of several medicinal plant species [ 64].
